Title: In Cold Blood
Plot: Henry prepares for war with France but receives cautious counsel from the powerful Cardinal Wolsey, who urges a peace treaty; the king learns that his queen's lady-in-waiting Elizabeth Blount is pregnant with his child.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Barry McGovern, Anna Brewster, Catherine Byrne, Ruta Gedmintas, Geoff Minogue, Blathnaid Mckeown, Jonathan White, Arthur Riordan, Eric Higgins, Mark Lambert, Slaine Kelly, Jonathan Ryan, Alan Devine, Brendan McCor
